Mel CW is looking for those that use a ap with the ipad for logging or recording medical records.,....I know what they r , do not have the first notion as to how to get one or use one....

Writing on here was a a long shot I know. Just figured if anyone was using specific apps it may give me a clue what works and what doesn't.I did find one that I sort of like 'osiriX HD'. It lets you load all of the radiology type pictures onto the iPad. I was messing with it because of some comments made on a recent radiology report. Trying to look for what they were talking about with my uneducated eyeballs. It is kind of nice because I can isolate those pictures snap a quick pic with the ipad. I've found it useful for those friends who what to know so they do some research on the net and then come to me with 'huh'. I showed one of my close friends the a pic I snapped this way and it proved to be an 'ahah' moment for him.But that got me to thinking about other medical records uses. Not finding many apps for the patient though, mostly for the Dr and clinical use.I did find one that at least acknowledges CM though!
